edge: This context provides the cast list for the movie Dragon Ball.
Justin Chatwin portrays the character Goku in this adaptation of Dragon Ball.
Chow Yun-fat plays the role of Master Roshi in this version of Dragon Ball.
Emmy Rossum takes on the character of Bulma in this movie version of Dragon Ball.
In this production of Dragon Ball, Jamie Chung plays Chi-Chi.
James Marsters performs the character King Piccolo in this rendition of Dragon Ball.
In this version of Dragon Ball, Joon Park portrays Yamcha.
Eriko Tamura takes on the role of Mai in this adaptation of Dragon Ball.
In this rendition of Dragon Ball, Randall Duk Kim plays the part of Grandpa Gohan.
This production of Dragon Ball features Ian Whyte as Ōzaru.
In this version of Dragon Ball, Ernie Hudson plays the character Sifu Norris.
Texas Battle represents Carey Fuller in this rendition of Dragon Ball.
Richard Blake performs the role of Agundes in this adaptation of Dragon Ball.
In this version of Dragon Ball, Megumi Seki takes on the role of Seki.
Shavon Kirksey portrays Emi in this rendition of Dragon Ball.
This version of Dragon Ball features Jon Valera as Moreno.
